reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: FLC: Campaign for the decriminalization of abortion

description.narrative: The project aims to strengthen and influence the legislative debate and decision makers through the campaign Right to decide = Free People of Coordinadora Feministas Valdivia a partner organization to Corporacion Humanas on issues of sexual and reproductiv e rights. The overall objective of this proposal is to raise the voice of women before and during the legislative process for the decriminalization of abortion in three causes: 1) lifetime risk of women; 2) fetal malformations incompatible with life and 3) pregnancy resulting from rape.The specific objectives are: 1) Raising awareness to state actors political parties and the general public about the importance of decriminalizing abortion. 2) Turn to the public particularly women to demand legalization of a bortion at least in the three causal involved in the presidential program and mentioned above. 3) To influence stakeholders executive and legislative branches.
